Articles.Content:
Have you had the RC L01 Guidance unit break free of the fuel tank ?

Do I need to secure it with strut connectors ??
Um, could you provide more information (such as a picture)? All parts can break off, and yes, more struts is probably the answer.
This happens most commonly when there is a heavy weight both above and below the unit. You can strut it, but often the easiest way is to move it somewhere else.
If anything ever breaks off....struts. Unlimited struts.
